parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: payType
parameters.description: Indicates the identifier of payment types for  letter of credit.

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: Start date of the loan

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: End date of the loan

parameters.name: minimumAmount
parameters.description: The minimum account balance required.

parameters.name: maximumAmount
parameters.description: The maximum account balance allowed.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

parameters.name: transactionCode
parameters.description: Identifies the system internal transaction code applicable to the transaction

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

debitCurrencyId.description: The currency of the debit side in payment transaction.

debitAmount.description: Amount to be debited in a payment transaction

debitValueDate.description: Date on which the amount will be debited for settlement

debitAccountId.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

debitAccountIBAN.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the debtor account, required only for International transfers/payments outside the Bank. For example: GB98 MIDL07009312345678, FR7630006000011234567890189

creditCurrencyId.description: Specifies the credit currency. For example: USD, EUR etc.

creditAmount.description: Amount to be credited in a payment transaction

creditValueDate.description: Reference quoted by the credit account for a payment

creditAccountId.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

creditAccountIBAN.description: Indicates the IBAN of the credit account

beneficiaryIBAN.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the beneficiary account, required only for International transfers/payments outside the Bank. For example: GB98 MIDL07009312345678, FR7630006000011234567890189

beneficiaryAccountId.description: Unique account identifier of the beneficiary account number.

beneficiaryCustomerId.description: Identifies the Customer who is to be the ultimate receiver of the funds transferred by the sending bank when this Beneficiary is not a bank.

bookingDate.description: Business date on which the accounting entry was generated.

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the Charge Amount after redeem

processingDate.description: The date when payment instruction is processed in system.

chequeNumber.description: Cheque number associated with the transaction or accounting entry.

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

customerRate.description: The exchange rate that is actually applied for currency conversion in case of transactions involving FX conversion.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message

imageId.description: A system generated unique identifier for the image record

imageType.description: Indicates the internal classification of images - such as Photographs, Documents, Passports, etc..,

bookingDate.description: Business date on which the accounting entry was generated.

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

accountName.description: Display name or short name of the account specified.

companyId.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

notes.description: Notes to facilitate the use of the function

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

bookingDate.description: Business date on which the accounting entry was generated.

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

accountName.description: Display name or short name of the account specified.

companyId.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

notes.description: Notes to facilitate the use of the function

imageId.description: A system generated unique identifier for the image record
